content: bring the nostalgia of a classic quilt into your home with this cushy crochet pillow worked diagonally form corner to corner in red heart all in one quilt motif the colorwork is done for you to create the front a complementary shade of red heart super saver is used for the solid back panel you ll love watching the colors appear as you practice chain double_crochet simple assembly single_crochet half_double_crochet and more choose your color combination for the perfect finishing touch to any room materials red heart® all in one™ quilt motif™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m main color mc lineage 0005 1 ball or 417 yds/381 m red heart® super saver® 7 oz/198 g 364 yds/333 m contrast a tea leaf 0624 2 balls or 403 yds/368 m gauges 5 double_crochet blocks = 4 10 cm in pat 12 single_crochet and 15 row = 4 10 cm measurement approx 20 51 cm square
